description.brief: Googletest unit testing framework for C++

package.description: gtest contains the googletest framework for C++, by Google. gtest is the standard unit test library for ROS code written in C++, including roscpp and, as such, is included within the ROS distribution. This package wraps version 1.3.0. Our intent is to migrate to OS package manager distributions as this library becomes more widely available. Until then we will track the latest stable version which is backwards compatable.
package.author: Google

cpp.cflags: `echo 'ERROR: It is invalid to depend on the gtest package'; false`
